hints.content:
Each whole has $6$ equal parts, so each part has a length of $\dfrac{1}{6}$.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, five unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark at 1, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. Six equal rectangles labeled one-sixth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. !

A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark with a dot labeled four-sixths, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark at 1, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. An arrow points to the right from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark labeled with a dot at four-sixths. Six equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. Four rectangles from the left are shaded and the last two rectangles are not shaded. The set of shaded rectangles is labeled four-sixths. !

question.content:
**What fraction is located at Point $\blueD{A}$ on the number line?**


[[☃ image 1]]

$\blueD{A} =$ [[☃ numeric-input 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled Point A, an unlabeled tick mark,  a tick mark at 1, and three unlabeled tick marks. Six equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. Four rectangles from the left are shaded and the last two rectangles are not shaded. !
